entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
